lead_paragraph: “Ignorance is not an excuse,” the station said, for using the image of a Star of David badge with the German word “Jude,” or Jew, on striped prison material.

headline.main: WGN-TV Chicago Apologizes for Nazi Symbol in Yom Kippur Segment

snippet: “Ignorance is not an excuse,” the station said, for using the image of a Star of David badge with the German word “Jude,” or Jew, on striped prison material.
